name: 林懷恩
objective:
鍍膜製程為近代製造業廣泛利用之表面處理技術，常用於刀具、模具、光學元件、感測器及半導體裝置等。本課程提供物理、化學法鍍膜技術之原理、設備之介紹。並講述膜成核、生長理論與近代薄膜科技於能源、光電、生醫與環境領域之應用。
Film deposition process, a surface treatment technology, has been widely used in modern manufacturing. It is commonly applied in the development of cutters, molds, optical component, sensor and semiconductor devices, etc. This course provides an introduction regarding the basic principle and apparatus of the coating technology (physical and chemical routes). Besides, the film nucleation, growth theory and their applications in energy, optoelectronic, biomedical and environmental fields are described as well.
